languages.text: "Ваши боевые навыки и глубина веры впечатляют. Возможно, однажды вы пожелаете служить Ему на иной стезе..."
"I am impressed by your combat skills and conviction. Perhaps, one day, you will consider serving Him under a different set of tenets..."
languages.original_text: "Ваши боевые навыки и глубина веры впечатляют. Возможно, однажды вы пожелаете служить Ему на иной стезе..."

languages.text: "Ich bin beeindruckt von Euren Kampfkünsten und Eurer Überzeugung. Vielleicht zieht Ihr eines Tages in Erwägung, dem Imperator im Namen anderer Glaubenssätze zu dienen ..."
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your combat skills and conviction. Perhaps, one day, you will consider serving Him under a different set of tenets..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin beeindruckt von Euren Kampfkünsten und Eurer Überzeugung. Vielleicht zieht Ihr eines Tages in Erwägung, dem Imperator im Namen anderer Glaubenssätze zu dienen ..."

languages.text: « Votre conviction et vos talents de combattante ne laissent pas de m'impressionner. Un jour peut-être envisagerez-vous de Le servir selon d'autres préceptes... »
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your combat skills and conviction. Perhaps, one day, you will consider serving Him under a different set of tenets..."

traits.locale_text: « Votre conviction et vos talents de combattante ne laissent pas de m'impressionner. Un jour peut-être envisagerez-vous de Le servir selon d'autres préceptes... »

languages.text: «Estoy impresionado por sus habilidades de combate y su convicción. Tal vez algún día opte por servir al Emperador bajo otros preceptos...».
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your combat skills and conviction. Perhaps, one day, you will consider serving Him under a different set of tenets..."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy impresionado por sus habilidades de combate y su convicción. Tal vez algún día opte por servir al Emperador bajo otros preceptos...».

languages.text: 「お前の戦闘技術と信念は素晴らしい。おそらくいつの日か、別の教義のもとで主に仕えようと考えるだろう…」
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your combat skills and conviction. Perhaps, one day, you will consider serving Him under a different set of tenets..."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の戦闘技術と信念は素晴らしい。おそらくいつの日か、別の教義のもとで主に仕えようと考えるだろう…」

languages.text: “你出色的战斗技巧与坚韧的信念给我留下了深刻的印象。或许未来的某一天，你会考虑通过另一种信条来侍奉神皇……”
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your combat skills and conviction. Perhaps, one day, you will consider serving Him under a different set of tenets..."

languages.text: "Çatışma yeteneklerin ve kanaatinden bir hayli etkilendim. Belki bir gün O'na farklı ilkeler ışığında hizmet etmeyi düşünürsün..."
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your combat skills and conviction. Perhaps, one day, you will consider serving Him under a different set of tenets..."
